replies.body:
First and foremost, I find it rather tasteless that so many summoners are commenting about their uncollected mystery champion on a COMPLETELY unrelated topic that features absolutely amazing and awe-inspiring artwork. This post is here to recognize a member of the community, not for you to vent about your problems, you can go do that elsewhere.

Secondly, correct me if I'm wrong, but did RIOT not say they would release your precious champions on July 1st? Is it not STILL July 1st? Undo thy finest panties into a knot that is not. Some of us already own all the champions so it's not like we're getting some exhilarating surprise. {{item:3151}}

> [{quoted}](name=Akoni Lati Okan,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=Ur5grOyG,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2015-07-01T20:00:26.400+0000)
>
Undo thy finest panties into a knot that is not. 

can i use this omg i laughed too hard
Well if you own all the champs then you get a mystery skin instead
What if I own all of those too? {{item:2050}} __{{item:2050}}

You'll probably get a Legacy Skin.
If you own ALL of the skins EVER, then...

>Riot will mail Phreak to you. He will arrive in roughly seventy-two (72) hours, and live with you for approximately one (1) week. During this time, He will make several (∞) puns and thoroughly kick your ass at League a minimum of twenty (20) times a day.
After one (1) week, Phreak will make one final pun, then get back into his box. A truck (with the RitoGames [not RiotGames, this is important] symbol on it) will arrive approximately ten (10) minutes later, and bring Phreak back to Riot HQ.
Phreak will then make one (1) pun about you in an episode of /ALL chat.
-A Rito Employee

Someone did this before me, by the way. I just wrote it out from memory.
ive seen this comment b4 :/ much copy pasta...
I didn't copy-paste it...And I also said it wasn't my idea.
I too remember seeing the post you got that from found it quite hilarious then as i do now. well played ender, well played.
why would you spend that much money on one game...god damn, get yo self a woman or something else to waste your money on.

Why not both,
have your cake and eat it, too.

If that's the case, you have too much money and have been playing for a VERY long time or have hacked them onto your account somehow. I wold like to see anyone that owns King Ramus, Pax Twisted Fate and all the other impossible to obtain skins.
Lel her name is nips... Like nipples...{{champion:76}}
I tip my fedora to you good sir.{{item:3089}}

"Undo thy finest panties into a knot that is not. " -Akoni Lati Okan 2015. 
I have never logged in just to upvote a comment for League, after all these years. You sir. You deserve a medal.

We get Mystery Skins instead, that's nowhere near as exciting as a Mystery Champion {{champion:222}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:115}} HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA! 



*If you couldn't tell all these champs are laughing/smiling*

And to the artist Nips, it would be really cool to see that FNC Jinx Rumble Annie with 2 other skins to complete the team, also maybe another pretty cool team comp you could make; the team has a C, an L, and a G in their name, I think that team's skins would be pretty cool. XD

*cough CLG4EVER cough*
It's "thine", not "thy".
Logged in just to upvote this. You have an angry, artful way with words, brother.
So true man, I kept thinking the same thing. {{item:3070}}
69 LIKES...70 now get wrekt fight me irl
You sir, are the finest gentlemen...we need more people like you.
Actually, I thought you were going to be getting a free skin if you owned them all. :D
Love the fan art so pretty <3
Thank you!! <3
Maaaan... Now I want Fnatic Jinx!
Is it possible to nudge riot into making the heart seeker sona skin a thing? I am so in "love" with it!!!
It's not heart seeker Sona it's obviously the new DJ Sona XOXO chroma pack.
Pretty cool gotta admit.
The name brought me here. Anyone else?

I love this drawing that nips did of C9 Sneaky {{champion:236}} : http://n1ps.deviantart.com/art/LoL-C9-Sneaky-529589828

Sneaky even uses it as his twitch profile pic, it's pretty awesome :O
Thought it meant nipples {{champion:25}}
That moment where fan drawn championship skins are WAY better than riot drawn skins. Hire her asap!
Nips is and always be one of my favorite artists

Everyone should down vote all of the "Where is my mystery champion" posts and get them sent to the bottom.  There is a time and place for everything and the discussion of this article is not the place for that, so go to the boards and post in the proper place.  With that being said, these works of art are amazing and I believe Riot should look at things like this for inspiration.  It would also be awesome if Riot maybe took submissions from different artists for an upcoming champion, skin design, or something along those lines and allowed the community to vote for a winner and allow that artist to help design said concept if they win.  It could be interesting to get new insights and a fresh perception on these things.  Just a thought.
Doesnt this mean who should downvote u also? It is about the mystary champ isnt it? Kappa

If anyone feels that I was off topic and did not show proper appreciation to this article then I greatly apologize and please down vote me.  The most important thing here is to get the constructive posts up and the off topic or toxic posts down.  If I fall into the latter, then push my ass down.

Dude i didnt think you would take it seriously i was joking. Im sorry for the miscommunication. I was just saying that it was about the mystery champ thing because you said downvote the people who say that. I apologize for makig you confused.

No worries.  I took no offense to your comment, you actually made a valid point.  I just wanted the article to be the center focus as it should be and if you or anyone else found my comment to be off topic, then I am not exempt from needing to be pushed down to prioritize the constructive posts.  I appreciate your apology though.  It's nice to see people who actually care about the impact of their words on others and want to make amends for them.  Once again, no worries friend.  :D

Yeah the one thing i try and do is make people feel good about the league community because i find it not always the nicest. I try and be the most positive person i can be to try and help make the community a better place because there is nothing I hate more then the people who nonstop rage all game.
I clicked on this hoping to see actual pictures of nips...... Nice art though!

Hahaha thank you so much!! 

You can blame my high school friends for that name.

> [{quoted}](name=Menea6587,realm=NA,application-id=2XjzURgc,discussion-id=Ur5grOyG,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-01T19:10:01.143+0000)
>
> She's an amazing artist and what sounds like an all-around great person to hang around. But that name is an ubertier thought worm that will always pop up wherever I see her work.
> 
> I'm sorry for bringing this up ;-;
> This probably gets brought up frequently for less savory reasons.

I thought she did it to troll our search engines.

Yo! This is some sick art! Why don't you guys look at it and appreciate this wonderful artist instead of whining about your mystery champ? {{item:3070}} "Oh Boo Hoo, my champ hasn't come yet" {{item:3070}}  Seriously. You'll get it when it comes
This is beautiful artwork, I wish I could draw as well as you can lol
Love the genderbends! Nice tweak to the armors to make them fit the male body. The team skins are well done.
This is so cool! I love the genderbent Diana!
All I'm saying is i want nothing more than a champion with a similar skillset to Diana, who also happens to be her brother. I want Diana's brother for a champion.
